basics.summary: I am interested in AI/ML, Topology, and long walks on the beach

education.area: Bachelor of Science in Artificial Intelligence; additional major in Discrete Mathematics and Logic

work.summary: Worked in bio-inspired robotics, applied AI/ML techniques to tasks like UAV flying and robotic swimmer locomotion.

projects.name: Understanding visual attention beehind bee-inspired UAV navigation
highlights: Used the attention patterns of trained Reinforcement Learning (RL) agents to infer how a real bee makes movement decisions
Built a goal-conditioned RL environment in OpenAI Gym to train a UAV to imitate bee behaviors using bee-like input sensors
Used SHAP values, a tool for explaining model output, to measure visual regions that trained RL agents pay attention to
